subject: Re: Updates to work flow descriptions for GIT
body:
On Tue, 2007-07-03 at 15:56 -0500, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
> Hash: SHA1
> 
> FYI...
> 
> I've updated work flow section of the GIT howto:
> 
> http://wiki.samba.org/index.php/Using_Git_for_Samba_Development#Work_Flow
> 
> It's not "War and Peace", but it is something :-)

Thank you, I am starting to see the light.
I ahve to say that mercurial looks more natural (coming from cvs/svn/bzr
basic knowledge), but git does not seem too bad once you start using it
either.

Simo.

-- 
Simo Sorce
Samba Team GPL Compliance Officer
